title: Privacy Policy
intro: DBCS Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') highly values the protection of members' personal information and complies with the 'Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection', Telecommunications Business Act, and Protection of Communications Secrets Act.
description: The Company has established a personal information handling policy to protect members' personal information and discloses it on the website to inform members about how their personal information provided online is used and what measures are taken to protect it.

toc.title: The Company's personal information handling policy includes the following:
items: Personal information items collected and collection methods
Purpose of collection and use of personal information
Retention and use period of collected personal information
Sharing and provision of collected personal information
Procedure and method of destroying personal information
Rights of users and legal representatives and how to exercise them
Matters regarding installation, operation and rejection of automatic personal information collection devices
Technical and administrative protection measures for personal information
Personal information manager and contact information
Personal information-related reports and dispute resolution

sections.title: Personal Information Items Collected
sections.content: The Company collects the following personal information for membership registration, consultation, and service applications.
items: Items collected: Name, Login ID, Password, Mobile phone number, Email, Resident registration number, Event date

sections.title: Purpose of Collection and Use
sections.content: The Company uses the collected personal information for the following purposes.
items: Contract fulfillment for service provision and content provision according to service charges

Member management: Identity verification for membership service use, personal identification, prevention of unauthorized use by bad members, confirmation of intent to join, age verification, confirmation of legal representative consent when collecting personal information of children under 14, handling complaints and grievances, delivery of notices

Marketing and advertising: Development and specialization of new services (products), delivery of advertising information such as events, service provision and advertising based on demographic characteristics

sections.title: Retention and Use Period
sections.content: The Company destroys the relevant information without delay after the purpose of collecting and using personal information has been achieved.

contact.title: Personal Information Inquiries
contact.content: You can report all personal information protection-related complaints arising from using the Company's services to the personal information manager or relevant department. The Company will promptly provide sufficient responses to user reports.

agencies.name: Supreme Prosecutors' Office Internet Crime Investigation
